    Methods

    public

    • addCssAndJavascript() — Adds the Css and Javascript sets that are required to load by HtmlDocument module for this UI component to properly work
    • addOption() — Adds an option to the menu
    • addOptions() — Adds a bunch of options to the menu
    • addSecondLevelOption() — Adds a secon level option to the specified option
    • addSecondLevelOptions() — Adds a bunch of options to the menu
    • buildHtml() — Builds the HTML of the menu and returns it.
    • buildOptionHtml() — Builds and returns the HTML for the specified option
    • setSecondLevelSelectedOption() — Sets the selected second level option of the menu
    • setSelectedOption() — Sets the selected option of the menu

    Inherited from Cherrycake\BasicObject

    public

    • build() — Creates an object and returns it
    • setProperties() — Bulk sets the given properties for this object
    • treatParameters() — Provides a system to pass complex parameters to a method, where parameters are passed in a hash array instead of the usual parameters passing method. A method using this system should accept a hash array of parameters and pass them as the first parameter to this method via a parent::treatParameters call, specifying as a second parameter a setup hash array of options for each parameter to be treated in a special way.
